aboutPage.subtitle: This project is a practical case study demonstrating the construction of a modern, multilingual, and high-performance web application.

mainGoal.title: Main Goal
mainGoal.paragraph1: The central objective of this project was to deepen knowledge in Next.js, with an emphasis on the use of Server Components, and to explore integration with the Headless CMS Sanity.io for managing dynamic and multilingual content.
mainGoal.paragraph2: The result is a robust content platform that serves as a technical portfolio, demonstrating the ability to build a modern, high-performance, and scalable web application.

challenges.title: Challenges and Solutions
challenges.i18n: Implementation of dynamic routes, interface translations, and localized content (posts, categories) from Sanity.io.
challenges.nextjs: Improvement in the use of Server Components, App Router, and strict typing to create a high-performance and easily maintainable application.
challenges.headless: Creation of content schemas in Sanity.io, real-time data fetching, and implementation of a draft mode system.
challenges.ux: Development of a cohesive interface that allows for fluid language switching and content preview before publication.

learnings.title: Learnings and Achievements
learnings.hardSkillDescription: Significant improvement in using advanced Next.js features and applying TypeScript for more robust code.
learnings.integrationDescription: Fundamental achievement in creating content schemas, real-time data fetching, and implementing Draft Mode for preview.
learnings.featureDescription: Successful implementation of language switching, offering a localized and optimized user experience.

skills.title: Technical Skills
skills.nextjs: Focus on App Router, Server Components, and performance.
skills.sanity: Data modeling, GROQ, and real-time integration.
skills.typescript: Strict typing for safer and more maintainable code.
